text: This page describes the qualifying procedure for the 1985 UEFA European Under-16 Football Championship. 25 teams were divided into 12 groups of two and three teams each. The twelve winners advanced to the final tournament. ==Results== ===Group 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=180|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L |2||1||1||0||2||1||+1||3 |- |align="left"| |2||0||1||1||1||2||−1||1 |} \---- ===Group 3=== Norway was the only team in this group. ===Group 4=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |-
